translations: n.适应症，显示；标志（indication 复数形式）

sentences.translation: 初期的迹象看起来鼓舞人心。

sentences.sentence: All the indications are that the deal will go ahead as planned.
sentences.translation: 从所有的迹象看，交易将按计划进行。

sentences.sentence: By mid-1988 there were clear indications of the extreme fragility of the Right-wing coalition.
sentences.translation: 到1988年年中有明显的迹象表明右翼联盟极度脆弱。
